description.raw:
Ran into a problem when running the distributed simulation example scripts, where the primary and secondaries fail to establish connection. The reason was that the heartbeat timeout was too short: 10 \* 100ms = 1s. I increased it to 100 \* 100ms = 10s.

To test

```
cd examples/scripts/distributed_levels
./secondary.sh &
./secondary.sh &
./primary.sh
```

The ign gazebo gui should come up after the last command and you should be able to play the simulation without any problems.
